name: bereaved
description:
And did you get what you wanted from this life, even so? I did. And what did you want? To call myself beloved, to feel myself beloved on the earth.”

---------------------------------------------------------------

'Bereaved' is a short narrative-driven, branching game, inspired by 'One Chance'. It was developed throughout (less than) one week by four Game Design students, as part of the course 'Game-A-Week'. 

The given theme was 'The End Of The World'. 

Credits

Justin Neumann 

Martim Grosner

Martin Bremer 

Martina Marchio 

Thanks Askjell for allowing us to use 'To Be Loved' as part of the soundtrack of this game, which would not exist without this song. ❤︎

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
